ancientTemple.name: snakes
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Snakes ahead! Be ready to jump over saying Whee!

ancientTemple.name: darts
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Yikes! I think I see some blow darts up ahead! Remember, say 'Whoah' to duck under them!

ancientTemple.name: spikes
ancientTemple.preObstacle: If you hear floor spikes, say 'whee' to jump over.

ancientTemple.name: arrows
ancientTemple.preObstacle: If we hear arrows, say 'woah' to duck.
